heading: Data Feeds
subHeading: Connect to the live data feed using any of our supported data providers
content: Data feeds supply data to run your live algorithm using LEAN. You can use multiple data feeds in live trading algorithms.

featureShortDescription.01: US Equities, US Options, Forex, & Futures
featureShortDescription.02: US Equities, US Equity Options, US Indices, & US Index Options
